text: Marco Chierice (born 1580) was an Italian painter. ==Biography== He was born and trained in Correggio. He mainly painted still-lives and landscapes. He painted in the parish church of Mandriolo (frazione of Correggio), and for the destroyed Casino of Count Ottavio Bolognesi. He was a painter for Duke Ferdinand Charles of Mantua.Notizie di Antonio Allegri, di Antonio Bartolotti suo maestro, e di altri pittori ed artisti Correggiesi, by Quirino Bigi 109-110. ==References== Category:1580 births Category:Year of death unknown Category:People from Correggio, Emilia-Romagna Category:17th-century Italian painters Category:Italian male painters Category:Italian still life painters Category:Mantuan painters
